Package arcade

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The logic behind the Connect 4 game containing all of the rules the game follows.
    Version:
    4/12/2018
    Author:
    Jake Miller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameLogic​()
      Default constructor setting up the board as a 7x6 2D array and sets the current player to 1.

      Constructor setting setting up the board as a 7x6 2D array and sets the current player to 1.
